title: Biggest Surge of Misinformation May Arrive After Election Day, Researchers Say
description: People who study disinformation are warning that far-right influencers will seize on ballot-counting delays and other routine issues as evidence of fraud.
dc:creator: Stuart A. Thompson
media:credit: Nic Antaya for The New York Times
media:description: Poll watchers monitor poll workers during the pre-processing of absentee voter ballots in Detroit on Nov. 6.
